title: Calculate Area of a Circle
description: This function calculates the area of a circle using its radius and a constant factor. The area is determined by the formula: Area = Ï€ * radius^2, where the radius is adjusted by a provided constant factor.
name: CIRCLE_A

input.name: ax
input.description: A constant multiplier factor that influences the area calculation.

return_value.description: The calculated area of the circle based on the provided radius and constant factor.
